attributes.action: Dismiss Hazel Blears from the Cabinet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to gordon brown, hazel blears avoidance of capital gains tax is "totally unacceptable". Why is she therefore still in the cabinet? She must be dismissed immediately.

rejection.details: Hazel Blears resigned her Cabinet post on 3 June 2009.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
